children.value: This post will create a personal blog using Gatsby themes and deploy the website using Github pages. (the domain of our website will be the github repository name)
Create a repo in our GitHub names "double-seven.github.io". We can see the Pages setting in our repo setting tab. Then clone our repo in our computer.
Create Gatsby projects files in our Git repository by running:

进入本地开发模式：
cd to the project-name file
"gatsby develop" to run the developping mode 本地开发模式
之后可以在http://localhost:8000看到目前的网站，或者在
（每次更新网页文件都需要重复操作3，并且更改需要等大概十分钟才会在网站上更新）

post编辑：
using .mdx file which allows you to use Markdown(轻量级标记语言) and JSX.
